input.activity_signal: Multiple confirming signals indicate active operations: Company website found via search at mettel.net describing current services, LinkedIn company page active, third-party telecommunications directory listings showing MetTel as an active provider, and consistent references to ongoing business operations across multiple web sources.
input.product_summary: MetTel is a global communications solutions provider offering integrated voice, data, network, cloud, and mobility services to enterprise companies and government agencies through their proprietary network infrastructure.
